title: Missing club tag in game!
body:
So i created a club got 5 (Currently 8 players) created club tag _**and it shows only in the game lobby and the loading screen**_.
_**Not showing in champ select not showing in game next to my name... **_ 
And not only mine I cant see any club tags in game or champ select.

replies.body: AFAIK club tags are still having a few issues showing up everywhere, which is probably the same issue you're having. I don't have a for sure fix quite yet, but I did poke a few things on my end to test something, so please let me know if it's showing up now or not!

Same its not showing up. I gotta ask is my name too long in order to appear 11 symbols.
_**Edit 24.01.2018 : Tag is back in game still not in champ select.**_ {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
